primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: God intervenes in a cosmos enslaved by the Powers of Sin and Death to liberate humanity and the entire creation through the victory of Jesus Christ.

subject.identificatie: God (specifically the Triune God: Father sending, Son defeating, Spirit indwelling)
tekstueel_bewijs: God has done what the law... could not do
He sent his own Son to enter into combat with Sin
God will be victorious over all that is wrong

object.identificatie: The Remaking of the World / Liberation from Bondage
tekstueel_bewijs: freed from its bondage to futility and decay

zender.identificatie: God the Father / The Purpose of the Creator
tekstueel_bewijs: according to the purpose of the One who called it into being

ontvanger.identificatie: The 'Elect' / The Entire Cosmos / Humanity without distinction
tekstueel_bewijs: gave him up for us all
redemptive purpose of God for all his creatures

helper.identificatie: The Holy Spirit / Christ as Intercessor
tekstueel_bewijs: the Spirit of Christ can do his redeeming work
Christ Jesus... who indeed intercedes for us
helper.rol_van_god: God is both Subject and Helper (Mediator)
helper.rol_van_geest: Indwelling power that produces 'small signals' like repentance

tekstueel_bewijs: bondage to the Powers of Sin and Death
annihilating Power that rules over us
tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: The opponent is not merely bad behavior but ontological 'Powers' that enslave the human will and the physical universe.

secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The believer bearing witness to God's victory through repentance and ethical conduct.
secundair_narratief_programma.subject: The Believer / The Lieutenant
secundair_narratief_programma.object: Bearing witness / Raising standards of conduct
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: Ethics is presented as a 'small sign' or consequence of the Spirit's work, never the cause of salvation.

actantieel_schema_visualisatie.helper_subject_tegenstander: Holy Spirit → God in Christ ← Sin/Death/Powers

voorbeelden_god_subject: God performed a uniquely potent deed
He condemned sin in the flesh
He fought and won a battle

voorbeelden: the just requirement of the law
the way that the principalities and powers take hold of the human will
In order to hear this gospel in its fullness, we have to go back
God has done what the law... could not do
powerless over the Law of Sin and Death
nothing we can do about our bondage

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon centers on the total lack of human 'Pouvoir' (power) and the absolute 'Pouvoir' of God to act where the Law failed.

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: Moves from the futility of ~S1 (Religion) and the reality of S2 (Judgment) to the unilateral action of S1 (Grace) which overcomes ~S2 (Bondage).
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: Christ takes the condemnation (S2) into his own flesh to liberate the Receiver.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: Extremely high; judgment is described as a 'cosmic scale' threat.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: The sermon is rigorously theocentric. It explicitly denies human agency in the primary narrative program and identifies God as the sole actor in salvation.

indicatoren_moralisme.indicator: Potential Exemplarism in the Lieutenant story
indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: raising the standard for wartime behavior

indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: God has done what the law, weakened by the flesh, could not do
annihilating Power that rules over us

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: The lieutenant is not an example to follow, but a 'sign' of the Spirit's prior work.
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: Theocentric: The Spirit works repentance in the lieutenant.

identificatie_patroon.effect_op_hoorder: Relief from the burden of self-justification; cosmic hope.

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: The secondary program (ethics) is perfectly subordinated to the primary program (soteriology).

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: He fought and won a battle against everything that would destroy us.

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: The Spirit grants the 'Pouvoir' to repent and bear witness.

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: Total bondage; no distinction between 'good' and 'bad' people.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The sermon maintains a strict actantial focus on God as the Subject of all redemptive verbs.

modale_balans.voorgestelde_balans: Maintain as is; this is a classic grace structure.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: This sermon is a masterclass in Rutledge's 'Grammar of Grace,' consistently making God the subject of the action.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: While a rhetorical analysis might focus on the Iraq war illustrations, Greimasian analysis shows these are actantially 'Receivers' or 'Signs' rather than 'Subjects' of their own salvation.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Moves beyond the meaning of 'sarx' to show how 'sarx' functions as an Opponent that disables the Subject (Man).
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Reveals that the 'Remaking of the World' is the Object of God's desire, placing the hearer in a position of radical dependency.

appendices.notities: The sermon successfully avoids the 'Exemplarism' trap by framing the lieutenant's confession as a 'sign of the Spirit' rather than a 'work of the man'.
